00094 inline FeatureVector FeatureVector::operator+ (const FeatureVector& featureVector) const
00095 {
00096     // Check if vectors have the same size
00097     if ( this->size_ not_eq featureVector.size_ )
00098         throw NessieException ("FeatureVector::operator+() : Size of vectors to sum must be equal");
00099 
00100     FeatureVector temp;
00101     
00102     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size_; ++i )
00103         temp.features_.at(i) = this->features_.at(i) + featureVector.features_.at(i);
00104     
00105     return temp;
00106 };
00107 
00108 
00109 inline FeatureVector FeatureVector::operator- (const FeatureVector& featureVector) const
00110 {
00111     if ( this->size_ not_eq featureVector.size_ )
00112         throw NessieException ("FeatureVector::operator-() : Size of vectors to subtract must be equal");
00113 
00114     FeatureVector temp;
00115     temp.features_.reserve(this->size_);
00116 
00117     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size_; ++i )
00118         temp.features_.at(i) = this->features_.at(i) - featureVector.features_.at(i);
00119         
00120     return temp;
00121 };
00122

00124 inline double FeatureVector::operator* (const FeatureVector& featureVector) const
00125 {
00126     if ( this->size_ not_eq featureVector.size_ )
00127         throw NessieException ("FeatureVector::operator*() : Size of vectors to multiply must be equal");
00128 
00129     double result = 0.0;
00130     
00131     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size_; ++i )
00132         result += this->features_.at(i) * featureVector.features_.at(i);
00133         
00134     return result;
00135 };
